pkgmetadata.longdescription: Continuous Time Mediation // Calculates standard errors and confidence intervals for effects in continuous-time mediation models. This package extends the work of Deboeck and Preacher (2015) doi:10.1080/10705511.2014.973960 and Ryan and Hamaker (2021) doi:10.1007/s11336-021-09767-0 by providing methods to generate standard errors and confidence intervals for the total, direct, and indirect effects in these models.
